sentences.en: After the egg has been fertilized, it will hatch in about six weeks.
sentences.cn: 蛋受精后六周左右孵化。

sentences.en: And farmers can use camel waist waste to fertilize their crops.
sentences.cn: 农民还用骆驼粪给作物施肥.

sentences.en: And farmers can use camel waste fodder laies fertilize their crops.
sentences.cn: 农场主们还使用骆驼的粪便给农作物施肥.

sentences.en: And farmers can use camel west waste to fertilize their crops.
sentences.cn: 农民能用骆驼的粪便来给农作物施肥.

sentences.en: Animal and drark and fed fertilize the fish and feed the fish.
sentences.cn: 动植物的废料能丰富池塘供给鱼的鱼料.

sentences.en: Fertilizer is a substance put on land to fertilize it.
sentences.cn: 肥料是施在地里使之肥沃的物质.

sentences.en: It is important to match varieties in order that they may cross - fertilize.
sentences.cn: 要配置的授粉品种必须是能互相授粉的.

sentences.en: Plant ash can be used to fertilize the soil.
Pumpkins get their start when bees fertilize their flowers.
sentences.cn: 当蜜蜂是南瓜花受精时他们的生命才得以开始.

sentences.en: Self sustaining gardening has to do with allowing foods to self fertilize.
sentences.cn: 自我维生菜园与允许植物自我施肥有关.

sentences.en: The bees may fertilize flowers when they collect nectar.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂采集花粉时会使花授粉.

sentences.en: The faeces contain nitrogen which fertilizes the soil.
sentences.cn: 排泄物含有肥沃土壤的氮。

sentences.en: They hauled feedlot manure from the ranches to fertilize their fields.
sentences.cn: 他们从牧场的饲养场拖走肥料去肥田.

sentences.en: To fertilize ( soil ) by applying material such as barnyard dung.
sentences.cn: 施肥用肥料如谷场旁的粪肥来肥沃 ( 土壤 )

sentences.en: We shoudl fertilize soil if we want to grow healthy plants.
sentences.cn: 如果我们要使农作物健康成长我们必须为土壤施肥.

sentences.en: We should fertilize soil if we want to grow healthy plants.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要作物健康生长,你必须给土壤施肥.

words.tran_cn: 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的
多产；肥沃；[农经] 生产力；丰饶
[肥料] 肥料；受精媒介物；促进发展者

trans.tran_en: to make new animal or plant life develop
